name: Underworld (grimn1r)
description:
Greetings everyone, we are thrilled to introduce our game, Under World, for Epic Mega Jam 2022. 

Our game is played with a third-person camera and takes place in the time of an advanced human society. Our character Dave, an electrical engineer, sets out to investigate the situation and save the people of Atlantis City when communication is lost with the underwater cities that humans have recently built and currently live in.

Get ready to face an interesting short story and experience various places.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 MAIN CONTROLS

W-A-S-D - MOVEMENT

SPACE - JUMP

LEFT CTRL - CROUCH

LEFT SHIFT - SPRINT

E - INTERACT

F - EQUIP

UNDERWATER CONTROLS

SPACE - ASCEND

LEFT ALT - DESCEND

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ENGINE VERSION -> Unreal Engine 4.27.2

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TEAM

Kadir Can Kızılarslan - Programmer

Ataman Kunbuk - Level Designer / UI Designer

Şahika Ezgi Çay - 2D Artist

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PLATFORM - Windows

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTENTS THAT WAS CREATED BEFORE JAM

-Big Office

-Edith Finch: Edie Room

-Edith Finch: House and Common Areas

-Kraken

- Reef Kit

-Soul: City

-Spaceship Interior Environment

-Vehicle Variety Pack

- Assets, materials, decals from Megascans

-Assets from Sketchfab

-Security Company Font from dafont

-Varsity Regular Font from dafont

-Spaceship Interior Environment

-Vehicle Variety Pack
